result.description:
This is a duplicate of rdar://22786605

Summary:
The always connected 4th gen AppleTV with its tvOS is a superb companion for iOS devices. But the connection is severely limited due to its missing MultiPeerConnectivity framework.

Expected Results:
Please reconsider and provide the same MultiPeerConnectivity API/framework on tvOS too.
result.title: Multipeer Connectivity for tvOS
